data.headline: Founder of NAKA Capital Partners
data.location: New York City, New York, United States, North America
data.about:
NAKA Capital Partners is a firm focused on investing, owning, and operating high quality companies in consumer and technology. NAKA Capital approaches its opportunities with a strategic mindset focused on driving long-term value creation through partnerships with top flight management teams, actively supporting operational improvements, and alignment with growth prospects.  

NAKA Media, a subsidiary of NCP, develops owned media properties for the financial services industry such as the Heard Around the Block interview series focused on the blockchain & cryptocurrency sector.

‚ÄúEmpty your mind, be formless, shapeless like water. Now you put water in a cup, it becomes the cup; You put water into a bottle it becomes the bottle; You put it in a teapot it becomes the teapot. Now water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend.‚Äù ~Bruce Lee

data.headline: Building Project Mirage | Ex-VP Hardware, Ultrahuman | Consumer Hardware
data.about:
I'm an Engineer turned Product Designer, with experience in building and scaling Consumer Hardware products.

Ultrahuman Home - a smart home device designed to help you understand how your home affects your health. 

Ultrahuman Ring Air - The lightest health tracking wearable in the world. Setup our in house Manufacturing facility called "Ultrafactory" to build the rings out of Bangalore, India on 2022. Set up a manufacturing unit for the ring in Texas, US in Oct 2024.

Ultrahuman Ring R1 - Reddot Design Award 2022

Handkey - an award winning key shaped tool with a sliding cover launched during the Covid 19 pandemic to avoid touching public surfaces with hands. 
-Featured on BBC

 Ring(LazyCo) - an AI remote control for the smartphone making day to day interactions 7x faster than phone touchscreens.
-Featured on Techcrunch
-Won awards and grants from Qualcomm, Alibaba, State Govt of Karnataka, Ministry of MSME, GoI
